div.title: Indiana Office of Work Based Learning

img.alt: Indiana Office of Work Based Learning

div.a: TSC students deemed essential in work-based learning programs

div.p: High school students in work-based learning programs are playing an important role in supporting the community during the pandemic.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.a: TSC makes remote learning a work of art

div.p: Students and teachers get creative and stretch their imaginations with art lessons.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.a: Free WiFi available at four TSC schools

div.p: Thanks to a partnership with Tipmont/Wintek, public WiFi is available at four TSC schools.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: Kelly Stockton reads a story to her students during an online chat

img.alt: Kelly Stockton reads a story to her students during an online chat

div.a: TSC teachers and students stay connected

div.p: Teachers are finding creative ways to keep in touch and send positive messages to their students during remote learning.

div.title: Anne Frank and a Google hangout of students discussing the play

img.alt: Anne Frank and a Google hangout of students discussing the play

div.a: TSC students learn history while living history

div.p: Wainwright Middle School English students are keeping a quarantine journal and making a connection to another historical event.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.a: TSC remote lunch program expands to five locations

div.p: Battle Ground Middle School and Wainwright Middle School will be added to the drive-up sites for grab-and-go meals.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.a: Tippecanoe County schools to end academic year May 15

div.p: Based on the Executive Order and guidance from the Indiana Department of Education, the TSC will continue to provide remote learning through May 15.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.a: TSC announces remote learning schedule through May 1

div.p: The TSC will use a blend of remote learning days and approved student waiver days from the State of Indiana.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.a: TSC expands grab-and-go lunch program

div.p: The Tippecanoe County Public Library Wyandotte Branch will serve as the third location for the meal program.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-132 fsTag-2 fsTag-35 fsTag-36 fsTag-37 fsTag-38 fsTag-39 fsTag-40 fsTag-41 fsTag-42 fsTag-43 fsTag-44 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-49 fsTag-50 fsTag-51 fsTag-52 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.a: TSC closure extended

div.p: All schools will remain closed until at least May 1 to help prevent the spread of the coronavirus. The TSC will use remote learning opportunities for students during some of this time,

ul.li: TSC has saved over $1.8 million through energy management initiatives
TSC is the second largest geographic school district in Indiana, encompassing 436 square miles
TSC employs over 1,600 full time staff
TSC serves over 345,000 breakfasts and 1.5 million school lunches a year
TSC has over 1,900 students enrolled in CTE courses
TSC offers a 1 to 1 student-to-computer ratio within its schools
TSC operates 172 school buses each day to transport students, traveling over 2.4 million miles a year
